titles.title: No Budget, No Pay Act
To provide that the salaries of Members of a House of Congress will be held in escrow if that House has not agreed to a concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2017 by April 15, 2016.
No Budget, No Pay Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
No Budget, No Pay Act
This bill withholds the salaries of Members of a house of Congress that has not agreed to a budget resolution for FY2017 by April 15, 2016, as required by the Congressional Budget Act of 1974.
Salaries are withheld from April 16, 2016, until the earlier of the date that the house of Congress agrees to a budget resolution or the last day of the 114th Congress.
